ch0109_10_kudari/0101_0701_01_10:
As always, you’ve arrived with a fantastic smile,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]
ch0109_10_kudari/0101_0701_02_10:
When you smile, I smile! Aim for friendship!
All aboard!
ch0109_10_kudari/7101_0701_01_10:
I am Emmet. I am a Subway Boss. I am wearing a
sygna suit.
ch0109_10_kudari/7101_0701_02_10: From now on, I can introduce myself like that!
ch0109_10_kudari/7101_0701_03_10:
I’ll keep winning and getting stronger so that
everyone will say I’m worthy of my sygna suit!
ch0109_10_kudari/7102_0701_01_10:
The electricity emitted by Eelektross’s fangs is very
powerful—maybe even enough to run a power
generation system.
ch0109_10_kudari/7102_0701_02_10:
If we ever develop a Magnet Train station on
Pasio, I’d love to see Eelektross generate the
power that runs it!
ch0109_10_kudari/7103_0701_01_10:
A serious battle is a clash of power against
power and feelings against feelings.
ch0109_10_kudari/7103_0701_02_10:
That feeling of wanting to win and not wanting
to lose is real.
ch0109_10_kudari/7103_0701_03_10: When we clash in battles, I feel very excited!
ch0109_10_kudari/7103_0701_04_10:
That’s why Pokémon battles should always be
serious!
ch0109_10_kudari/7104_0701_01_10:
Sync pairs on Pasio are really giving their all
to aim higher.
ch0109_10_kudari/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s why I’m sure that, here on Pasio, we can
find that destination Ingo is always talking
about—an even higher state!
ch0109_10_kudari/7104_0701_03_10:
That higher state is what we should aim for as
Subway Bosses!
ch0109_10_kudari/7105_0701_01_10:
Battles with you are always so much fun,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0109_10_kudari/7105_0701_02_10: After all, you have a heart that never gives up...
ch0109_10_kudari/7105_0701_03_10:
and you’re always trying hard to get stronger and
stronger!
ch0109_10_kudari/7105_0701_04_10:
Every time I battle you, I’m excited to see how
much stronger you’ve gotten!
ch0109_10_kudari/1701_0701_01_10:
I have a present for you. Please take it, if you
like!
ch0109_10_kudari/1701_0702_01_10:
How and where you use it is up to you! I’m sure
you’ll find the best, perfect timing to put it to
good use!
ch0109_10_kudari/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad Ingo and I get to wear our sygna suits
together!
ch0109_10_kudari/2501_0701_02_10: Us Subway Bosses are a set, after all!
ch0109_10_kudari/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m really grateful for the designer who worked
with us to finish them!
ch0109_10_kudari/2501_0702_01_10:
Come to think of it, I suppose Ingo and I do often
wear complementary outfits...
ch0109_10_kudari/2501_0702_02_10:
Tate and Liza do as well... Maybe it’s a twin
thing?
ch0109_10_kudari/2511_0701_01_10:
I like Pasio team battles. I like seeing combinations
of different sync pairs.
ch0109_10_kudari/2511_0701_02_10:
And I like winning serious battles more than
anything.
ch0109_10_kudari/2511_0702_01_10:
Everyone on Pasio is strong, so I think I can get
stronger, too.
ch0109_10_kudari/2511_0702_02_10:
These battles make me stronger because they’re
the best, perfect fun!
ch0109_10_kudari/2511_0702_03_10: I’ll keep aiming for victory together with Ingo!
ch0109_10_kudari/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornings are busy—but don’t panic! Check safety.
Get ready to depart. Then, drive safely!
ch0109_10_kudari/3003_0701_01_10:
Schedules can get disrupted. If your plan today
was thrown off, consider a change in route.
ch0109_10_kudari/3005_0701_01_10:
Tomorrow is business as usual. I am sure you will
show up here again. I will wait for it.
